meta.description: Language labels for BE module of "external_import"

languageKey.label: External Data Import
Main BE module for the External Import extension
External Import
External Data Import
Tables with synchronization
Tables without synchronization
External tables

Here is the list of all tables using external data as defined in the TCA. From here you can manually synchronise any table. Note that you should synchronise tables with high priority (lower number) first, since lower priority tables probably depend on them.
There are currently no external tables defined.
Non-synchronizable tables
The tables listed here receive data from external sources, but do not fetch it directly. They cannot be synchronised from this BE module, but are listed here for information.
There are currently no non-synchronizable tables defined.

It is possible to define a frequency for the automatic synchronisation of all external tables.
Automatic synchronisation of external tables is not possible, because neither extension "gabriel", nor system extension "scheduler" (TYPO3 4.3+) are installed.
Automatic synchronisation of external tables is not possible, because the system extension "scheduler" is not installed.
